name: trip:finished
description: Sent after a trip is completed and processed by Automatic.

name: ignition:on
description: Sent when vehicle ignition is turned on.

name: ignition:off
description: Sent when vehicle ignition is turned off.

name: notification:speeding
description: Sent after a 'velocity exceeded threshold' event occurs.

name: notification:hard_brake
description: Sent when a hard baking event occurs.

name: notification:hard_accel
description: Sent when a hard acceleration event occurs.

name: mil:on
description: Sent when an MIL (check engine light) comes on.

name: mil:off
description: Sent when an MIL (check engine light) goes off.
